verses.verse: It is <WG2076> indeed unnecessary <WG4053> for <WG1063> me <WG3427> to write <WG1125> to you <WG5213> <WG99999> concerning <WG4012> the service <WG1248> to <WG1519> the saints, <WG40>

for <WG1063> I know <WG1492> your readiness, <WG4288> <WG5216> of which <WG3739> I boast <WG2744> on your <WG5216> behalf <WG5228> to them of Macedonia, <WG3110> that <WG3754> Achaia <WG882> has been prepared <WG3903> for <WG575> a year past. <WG4070> <WG2532> <WG1537> Your <WG5216> zeal <WG2205> has stirred <WG2042> up very many of them. <WG4119>

But <WG1161> I have sent <WG3992> the brothers <WG80> that <WG2443> our <WG2257> boasting <WG2745> on <WG5228> your <WG5216> behalf may not <WG3361> be in vain <WG2758> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> respect, <WG3313> that, <WG2443> just as <WG2531> I said, <WG3004> you may <WG3903> be <WG5600> prepared, <WG3903>

so that I won't <WG3381> by any means, if <WG1437> there come <WG2064> with <WG4862> me <WG1698> any of Macedonia <WG3110> and <WG2532> find <WG2147> you <WG5209> unprepared, <WG532> we <WG2249> (to <WG2443> say <WG3004> nothing <WG3361> of you <WG5210>) should be disappointed <WG2617> in <WG1722> this <WG3778> confident <WG5287> boasting. <WG2746>

I thought it <WG2233> necessary <WG316> therefore <WG3767> to entreat <WG3870> the brothers <WG80> that <WG2443> they would go before <WG4281> to <WG1519> you, <WG5209> and <WG2532> arrange ahead of time <WG4294> the generous <WG2129> gift that you <WG5216> promised before, <WG4293> that the same <WG3778> might be <WG1511> <WG3779> ready <WG2092> as <WG5613> a <WG3779> matter of generosity, <WG2129> and <WG2532> not <WG3361> of greediness. <WG4124>

Remember <WG1161> this: <WG5124> he <WG3588> who sows <WG4687> sparingly <WG5340> will also <WG2532> reap <WG2325> sparingly. <WG5340> <WG2532> He <WG3588> who sows <WG4687> <WG99999> bountifully <WG2129> will also <WG2532> reap <WG2325> <WG99999> bountifully. <WG2129>

Let each man <WG1538> give according as <WG2531> he has determined <WG4255> in his heart; <WG2588> not <WG3361> <WG1537> grudgingly, <WG3077> or <WG2228> under <WG1537> compulsion; <WG318> for <WG1063> God <WG2316> loves <WG25> a cheerful <WG2431> giver. <WG1395>

And <WG1161> God <WG2316> is able <WG1415> to make all <WG3956> grace <WG5485> abound <WG4052> to <WG1519> you, <WG5209> that <WG2443> you, <WG3842> always having <WG2192> all <WG3956> sufficiency <WG841> in <WG1722> everything, <WG3956> may abound <WG4052> to <WG1519> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work. <WG2041>
As <WG2531> it is written, <WG1125> "He has scattered abroad, <WG4650> he has given <WG1325> to the poor. <WG3993> His <WG846> righteousness <WG1343> remains <WG3306> <WG1519> forever. <WG165>"

Now <WG1161> may he who <WG3588> supplies <WG2023> seed <WG4690> to the sower <WG4687> and <WG2532> <WG5524> bread <WG740> for <WG1519> food, <WG1035> supply and <WG2532> multiply <WG4129> your <WG5216> seed for sowing, <WG4703> and <WG2532> increase <WG837> the fruits <WG1081> of your <WG5216> righteousness; <WG1343>

you being enriched <WG4148> in <WG1722> everything <WG3956> to <WG1519> all <WG3956> liberality, <WG572> which <WG3748> works <WG2716> through <WG1223> us <WG2257> thanksgiving <WG2169> to God. <WG2316>

For <WG3754> this <WG3778> service <WG3009> of giving that you perform <WG1248> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> makes <WG4322> up for lack <WG5303> among the saints, <WG40> but <WG235> <WG99999> abounds <WG4052> also <WG2532> through <WG1223> many <WG4183> givings of thanks <WG2169> to God; <WG2316>

seeing that <WG1223> through the proof <WG1382> given by this <WG3778> service, <WG1248> they glorify <WG1392> God <WG2316> for <WG1909> the obedience <WG5292> of your <WG5216> confession <WG3671> to <WG1519> the Good News <WG2098> of Christ, <WG5547> and <WG2532> for the liberality <WG572> of your contribution <WG2842> to <WG1519> them <WG846> and <WG2532> to <WG1519> all; <WG3956>

while <WG2532> they themselves <WG846> also, <WG1162> with supplication on your <WG5216> behalf, <WG5228> yearn <WG1971> for you <WG5209> by reason <WG1223> of the exceeding <WG5235> grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316> in <WG1909> you. <WG5213>
Now thanks <WG5485> be to <WG1909> God <WG2316> for <WG1161> his <WG846> unspeakable <WG411> gift! <WG1431>
